occupation: Fractional Chief Marketing Officer, Founder at Gen X Group
headline: Fractional Chief Marketing Officer → Helping CEOs Scale The Business While Scaling Their Health | Executive Coach | #1 Best-Selling Author | Global Health & Wellness, and TEDx Speaker (1M+ views)
summary:
You’re a CEO focused on Societal Innovation, needing to scale impact through your people, products, and profits.

You recognize marketing's importance and need guidance amidst the cataclysmic changes in marketing today.

To scale, you need help figuring out:

→Humanized marketing.
→Utilizing AI in marketing.
→Marketing that drives ROI.
→Maintaining brand authenticity.
→Data-driven retention strategies.
→Implementing sustainable processes.
→Evolving products for sustained growth.
→Marketing growth vs. Board expectations. 

While trying to:

→Improve your well-being.
→Reduce your stress levels.
→Empower employees to thrive. 
→Invigorate remote team dynamics.

You need Marketing that’s sustainable, resilient, adaptable, and innovative to market dynamics.

Which empowers teams, builds relationships, fosters collaboration, encourages innovation, ensures flexibility, and cultivates LTV and growth.

How do you get here? This is where I come in.

WHAT I DO: My sweet spot is:

Business Strategy → Product-Market Fit → Brand and Marketing → Go-to-Market

Wrapped up in Leadership Development (personal and professional) so that you can feel and be at your best to lead healthily and scale your company.

WHY WORK WITH ME? Over my 20+year marketing career, I've:

→Generated $1BN+ in new products and channel production.
→Been part of Executive teams who’ve raised $1/2BN+ in funding.
→Taken companies from idea to fundraise, to IPO (2), and acquisition (2).
→Increased conversion 400% by implementing humanized digital marketing strategies.

I've digitally transformed the stories and products of global brands–Apple, TiVo, Oracle, Califia Farms, LVMH Moët Hennessy Louis Vuitton, and Sephora, with whom I won the WWD Digital Innovator of the Year award.

My unique background is a mix of Engineering + Product Management + Marketing + Exec Coaching.

I bring deep inner/core skills (communication, relationship building, listening, trust, empathy, kindness) to the table, that are paramount to leadership and transformation.

I believe for businesses to thrive, people must thrive first – through personal development, an employee-first view, and building relationships internally and externally.  

My personal health transformation story is that I overcame a lifetime of 32+ food allergies, and proudly share my story in my #1 Best-Selling Book, NUT JOB, TEDx Talk (1M+ views), and as a Keynote Speaker represented by AAE Speaker’s Bureau. 

Let's connect so I can learn more about your needs.

💛 DM me
📧 Email sonia@soniahunt.com
📱 Book 1:1 time - link in my Featured section

experiences.title: Fractional Chief Marketing Officer, Founder
experiences.description:
With ~20 years experience as a Chief Marketing Officer, today I work with CEOs and organizations focused on Societal Innovation and who develop solutions for the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals. 

My specialization areas emcompass: 

→Health & Wellness
→Digital Health 
→Climate Tech
→Health Tech
→Healthcare
→Food Tech
→Agri Tech
→Ed Tech

I bring a unique background of technical (engineering, product management), business (marketing, partnerships, and strong inner skills (EQ, communication relationship building, listening, trust, empathy, kindness) that span across the product lifecycle and are paramount to healthy leadership.

My clients are creating a future that's grounded in a foundation of health and well-being for themselves, their people, and the planet. 

Services include: Fractional CMO, Advisory / Board Member.

experiences.title: Global Wellness Speaker
experiences.description:
As a Global Health & Wellness Speaker, I deliver empowering keynotes, fireside chats, and well-being workshops at corporations and conferences.

Topic include: Food/Nutrition, Dietary Restrictions, Chronic Conditions, Employee Well-being, Advancing BIPOC Health, Healthy Leadership, Women's Health, and more.

Trusted By: Amazon, Goldman Sachs, Upwork, Dover Fueling Solutions, National Wellness Institute, Food & Wine Magazine, Holland America Cruise Lines, PopSugar, Thrive Global, Drexel University, EatReal.org, and many other clients and conferences globally.

View my Speaker Reel and learn more at https://soniahunt.com.

Check out my TEDx Talk (1M+ views): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b3uc3JN4HOU

experiences.title: #1 Best-Selling Author
experiences.description:
My #1 Best-Selling book, "NUT JOB: How I Crushed My Food Allergies To Thrive," chronicles my journey of overcoming 32 severe food allergies, using, Three To Be™, a holistic health and well-being program I extensively researched and created over the course of a decade alongside medical practitioners. 

'NUT JOB' is available on Amazon.com, Barnes & Noble, and wherever books are sold.

experiences.title: CEO Mentor, Advisor
experiences.description:
Unreasonable is a private global network, investment fund, and multi-media company operating immersive programs for social impact ventures at high growth-stage. These CEOs offer solutions to the UN's Sustainable Development Goals and the seemingly intractable social and environmental world challenges. 

I mentor and advise the CEOs who are fellows within the Unreasonable program, helping them scale their business, marketing, and people.

Highlighted programs: Goldman Sachs "One Million Black Women Initiative", Fiverr Future Collective.

experiences.title: Faculty Speaker, CEO Coach
experiences.description:
I speak at CEO cohorts led by 1863 ventures and in partnership with Fortune 500 companies to accelerate New Majority CEOs from high potential to high growth by bridging entrepreneurship and racial equity. Subject matter expertise for the cohorts include: Business Strategy, Brand and Marketing, Leadership Development, Entrepreneurship, Fundraising.

I also act as a CEO Coach to the companies within the cohorts, helping CEOs scale their people, products, and profits.

1863 Ventures is a leader in providing culturally competent accelerator programs, non-dilutive financing, and mentorship to Black, Latino, and other historically underestimated entrepreneurs.

experiences.title: Guest Speaker
experiences.description: My Health and Well-being Speaker Series provides students with the much-needed education to help them learn to prioritize health, take actionable steps to improve health and optimize their well-being.

experiences.title: Chief Marketing Officer, Founder
experiences.description: Noie Media is a digital agency focused on humanizing digital products and consumer experiences for the brands we work with. We design engaging, relationship-building, human consumer experiences that are driven by strong omnichannel marketing strategies and rooted in data and technology.  Our clients fall in the Hi-Tech, Lifestyle, Health and Wellness, and Consumer Technology spaces.

volunteer_work.title: Advisor
volunteer_work.description: Advisor and mentor for educational programs for middle school and high school grade kids. I participate in Nepris' skills-based volunteering platform to connect with teachers and students across America, bringing real-world relevance and application to classroom instruction. By virtually volunteering, I help educators expose students to different industry and career pathways in STE(A)M to extend my organization's educational outreach, give students an inside look into my career field, better prepare them for life after school, and bridge the gap between education and industry.

volunteer_work.title: Volunteer
volunteer_work.description: The mission of Achilles International is to empower people with all types of disabilities to participate in mainstream running athletics in order to promote personal achievement.

recommendations:
Bianca J. Jackson, MBA, PMP®



I had the pleasure of participating in Sonia Hunt's Coaching services for the Fiverr Cohort - Future Collective program via 1863, and it was a transformative experience for both me and my business. Sonia is a master "quilt maker," expertly helping business leaders piece together the fragments of their strategy to craft a cohesive and beautiful vision for the future.

During our coaching sessions, Sonia's insights were invaluable. The most impactful aspect of her executive coaching was her guidance on identifying our 2-3 core personas and creating a simple USP to market to them. This strategic shift completely revolutionized our targeting strategies, allowing us to connect more effectively with our audience.

Sonia's approach challenged my conventional thinking, pushing me to explore new possibilities and embrace innovative solutions. Her ability to break down complex concepts into actionable steps made the process seamless and highly effective.

Working with Sonia was not only enlightening but also thoroughly enjoyable. Her supportive and encouraging demeanor created a positive environment where growth and learning thrived. I highly recommend Sonia Hunt to anyone looking to elevate their business strategy and achieve remarkable results.

Abhishek Sahu



I underwent a transitional period due to a layoff, and I'm grateful that Sonia was there to assist me throughout the journey. From establishing my personal brand to offering invaluable guidance in resume refinement, LinkedIn profile enhancement, mock interviews, and negotiation of compensation, Sonia provided comprehensive coaching and support. Her insights into overall career development were particularly beneficial. I enthusiastically endorse Sonia for coaching services.
